The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that may represent a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Structure-activity relationships of fowlicidin-1, a cathelicidin antimicrobial peptide in chicken
Literature.Author: Xiao Y, Dai H, Bommineni YR, Soulages JL, Gong YX, Prakash O, Zhang G

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:50% Hemolysis=1 µM,Madin-Darby canine kidney cells:50% Cell death=11 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=1.9µM),Listeria monocytogenes ATCC 19115(MIC=>7.6µM),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium ATCC 14028(MIC=1.9µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=>7.6µM)
